engineerstools.config.title: 工程師的工具 config
item.engineerstools.crushing_hammer.name: 碎礦錘
item.engineerstools.crushing_hammer.help:
§6Manual handheld ore crushing hammer.§r Higher yield when manually \
                                         crafting ore to grit in a crafting table. Has a low durability, and \
                                         cannot be repaired. Almost no attack damage.
item.engineerstools.redia_tool.name: REDIA Tool
item.engineerstools.redia_tool.help:
§6REal DIAmond covered steel multi tool.§r Combines axe, pickaxe, and shovel. \
                                    Very efficient when in good condition, slow when durability is low. Repair with Diamonds.\n\
                                    Right-click: Place torch.\n\
                                    Sneak-right-click: Hoe Dirt to Farmland, Coarse Dirt, etc; Shear sheep, Vines, Leafs etc.\n\
                                    Sneak while breaking a wood log: Tree felling.
item.engineerstools.iron_grit.name: 粗鐵砂
item.engineerstools.iron_grit.help: §6可以熔煉成金錠，   但不適合進階   材料加工。
item.engineerstools.gold_grit.name: 粗金沙
item.engineerstools.gold_grit.help: §6可以熔煉成金錠，  但不適合進階  材料加工。
item.engineerstools.ariadne_coal.name: 煤碳粉筆
item.engineerstools.ariadne_coal.help:
§6Draw orientation arrows to find the way out of your mines.§r\n\
                                      The arrow direction depends on where you click on the block to draw on.
item.engineerstools.stimpack.name: 自動強心劑
item.engineerstools.stimpack.help:
§6Helps when you're in big trouble§r\n\
                                  ... by pushing a few hearts when health is low. Also gives you a small buff to get out of \
                                  any present misery. Warning: The injection may have a delay.
item.engineerstools.sleeping_bag.name: 睡袋
item.engineerstools.sleeping_bag.help: §6Made of tough fabric§r, therefore weatherproof and very robust. Does not set your spawn point like beds.
tile.engineerstools.ariadne_coal_x.name: 煤碳粉筆
tile.engineerstools.ariadne_coal_y.name: 煤碳粉筆
tile.engineerstools.ariadne_coal_z.name: 煤碳粉筆
